48.ara-name: كتاب الدعوات عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Umar bin Al-Khattab [may Allah be pleased with him] narrated:“Whenever the Messenger of Allah would raise his hands in supplication, he would not lower them until he had wiped his face with them.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي رَفْعِ الأَيْدِي عِنْدَ الدُّعَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Raising The Hands When Supplicating
